text: You gotta stop using boring captions like this in your videos. Instead, use these captions to grab attention every time. Here's exactly how to create them. Step number one, the font. This is the most important part. You can add as many cool effects as you want to your captions, but if you pick the wrong font, nothing is gonna save you. So here's a list of fonts we love and use all the time. Step number two, the glow. After you pick the right font, it's time to spice it up a bit, and we're going to do this with the glow effect. The fastest way to do this is by adding a white drop shadow and tweak the blur and opacity until you get something that looks like this. And last step is the inverted text. You've probably seen this effect going viral on social media, and the reason is simple, it just looks good. To do it, go into your font settings, find the blending mode or however it might be called in your software, and change it from normal to difference. So now that you know all of this, please...

So here's a list of fonts we love and use all the time.
Step number two, the glow.
After you pick the right font, it's time to spice it up a bit,

and tweak the blur and opacity

And last step is the inverted text.

To do it, go into your font settings, find the blending mode

and change it from normal to difference.
So now that you know all of this, please...
